Class LibrarySearch

java.lang.Object
  LibrarySearch

public class LibrarySearch
extends java.lang.Object

The LibrarySearch class organizes book records into a modifiable and viewable database.

Version:
v1.0 ...
Author:
Julian Di Leonardo

Field Detail

database

public static java.lang.String[][] database
The Database array is a 2D array where the records entered by the user are stored. Each index of the array stores 1 of 3 parts of the record entered by the user

search

public static void search()
Scans through the database and compares the user entered keywords to the records within the database. Returns matching entries.
